Linda Fleming.action: Jaxx (Linda) comforts her daughter Jamie after she didn't get first place, telling her they are proud of her even if she doesn't win.
Linda Fleming.assessment: This shows Linda's supportive and loving nature, emphasizing pride in effort rather than just success, which is a warm and nurturing behavior.

Linda Fleming.action: Jaxx kisses Jamie goodnight and holds her hand as they head to school, with Jamie squeezing back.
Linda Fleming.assessment: Physical affection and mutual warmth in this interaction indicate a close, trusting, and affectionate relationship, reflecting Linda's warmth.

Linda Fleming.action: Uses a beer opener to punch around the edge of a dog food can when the electric can opener doesn't work.
Linda Fleming.assessment: This shows resourcefulness and practical problem-solving skills in an unexpected situation, indicating a competent and adaptive approach.

Linda Fleming.action: Sustains a cut on her hand from the jagged edge of the can but quickly assesses the injury and continues with her tasks.
Linda Fleming.assessment: Demonstrates resilience and ability to manage minor injuries without panic, reflecting steady and capable behavior.

Linda Fleming.action: Whiteknuckles her steering wheel waiting for the trunk to pop open, showing tension and focus.

Linda Fleming.action: Carefully prepares and suits up in protective gear to handle a dangerous virus.
Linda Fleming.assessment: Linda's meticulous preparation and adherence to safety protocols demonstrate responsibility and care for herself and others, indicating a conscientious and trustworthy nature, which are aspects of warmth.

Linda Fleming.action: Slides her right hand into a surgical glove, tapes the glove to her sleeve with brown sticky tape, then slides her gloved hands down the spacesuit sleeves into heavier surgical gloves.
Linda Fleming.assessment: This sequence shows careful preparation and attention to detail in donning protective gear, indicating skill and knowledge in handling hazardous environments.

Linda Fleming.action: Closes her diagonal zipper and airtight Ziploc, then enters a stainless-steel multiheaded 'envirochem' shower, maintaining steady rhythmic heartbeat despite the stressful environment.
Linda Fleming.assessment: Her methodical approach to sealing her suit and maintaining composure under pressure reflects confidence and capability in high-risk situations.

Linda Fleming.action: Hooks a coiled airhose into the short hose protruding from a 'MEPA' filter canister on her thigh, clearing her faceplate with a rush of air.
Linda Fleming.assessment: This demonstrates technical proficiency and familiarity with complex protective equipment, reinforcing her competence in biohazard protocols.

Linda Fleming.action: Opens a pass-through chute and pulls a monkey bag onto a stainless steel bleed table inside the BL4 lab.
Linda Fleming.assessment: This action shows procedural knowledge and careful handling of potentially dangerous materials, indicating skill and confidence.

Linda Fleming.action: Picks up a scalpel from the 'sharps' box and makes a chest incision.
Linda Fleming.assessment: Performing a precise surgical action in a high-containment environment suggests advanced technical skill and steady confidence.

Linda Fleming.action: Encourages Peter not to panic after he fears Ebola infection, saying 'There's a good chance you're not infected! Don't go dinki-dao on me now.'
Linda Fleming.assessment: Linda's attempt to calm Peter and inject some humor shows care and a friendly, supportive attitude in a stressful situation.

Linda Fleming.action: Dunks both blood-covered gloves in the Clorox pan, cleaning them after a procedure.
Linda Fleming.assessment: This action shows Linda's awareness of proper lab hygiene and safety protocols, indicating skill and responsibility in handling biohazards.

Linda Fleming.action: Quickly clamps Peter onto a spare air hose when his air supply fails in the BL4 lab.
Linda Fleming.assessment: This demonstrates Linda's quick thinking and technical competence under pressure, ensuring safety in a critical situation.

Linda Fleming.action: Reassures Peter that there is a good chance he is not infected and suggests testing antibodies instead of panicking.
Linda Fleming.assessment: This shows Linda's calm, confident, and knowledgeable approach to a dangerous situation, reflecting strong competence in crisis management and scientific understanding.

Linda Fleming.action: Points to the big refrigerator with all the viruses to get the 'Sister G' serum.
Linda Fleming.assessment: By directing attention to the specific serum needed, Linda shows practical support and concern for the team's efforts, indicating a helpful and cooperative nature.

Linda Fleming.action: Points to the big refrigerator with all the viruses to get the 'Sister G' serum.
Linda Fleming.assessment: This action shows Linda's knowledge of the lab environment and the location of critical materials, indicating familiarity and confidence in a high-stakes setting.

Linda Fleming.action: Peels the glove slowly off and checks her hand carefully for contamination, confirming her hand is clean under the Band-aid.

Linda Fleming.action: Fills the glove with water at the faucet to test for leaks before declaring no leaks and that she is fine.
